p: The major and minor fatty acid composition of the six P. harmala accessions are listed in Table 2. The major fatty acids identified in P. harmala seed oils were C16:0, C18:0, C18:1 ω7, C18:1 ω9 and C18:2; however, fatty acids, such as vaccenic (C18:1 ω7), linolenic (C18:3 ω3), arachidic (C20:0), behenic (C22:0) and tetracosanoic (C24:0) acids were detected at lower levels.
